name: Please Sire!!!
description:
Board Pixel Jam 8 Theme: You are not the Hero

Instead of normally controlling the hero, you control the retainer who follows the hero's adventures in the dungeon.

Dodge Enemy's projectile while collecting loot and try to keep up with the hero as long as you can.

Controls:
W A S D - Movement

The game is still a prototype at this stage. Let us know what else you'd like to add or if the concept is good.

We'll add these soon.
- The rest of the enemies (We made 4 but only 2 are available right now)
- Music / FX
- The intended scoring system (There are 4 loots and this system is still bare bones)

Bugs:

- Sometimes enemies don't spawn - restart the game.

- There is no edge you can walk infinitely to one side and no enemy will kill you.
